text.headline: SRM Team Humanoid Electonics Domain Head
text.text: Worked as a electronics integration head at SRM Team Humanoid designing bipedal robots for gait and image processing applications. Assisted the computer vision team in developing miniture image segmentation models to run on low power devices like Raspberry Pi.

text.headline: IIT Mumbai Indo US Robo-League
text.text: Spearheaded development of simple manipulator arm for IIT Mumbai's Indo US Robo-League. Competed in grasping challenge which tasked a user from controlling the robot to sort small light boxes. Led to team to second place at the competition.

text.headline: BITS Pilani techfest
text.text: Collaborated with team humanoid members on developing a telepresence humanoid system to mimic user movements over long distances. Designed as a medical robot, the user would stand infront of a camera which would perform skeleton tracking and map te user movements to the robot while providing VR and haptic gloves as feedback. Secured a second place for best idea at the conference.

text.headline: SRM Konvolve
text.text: Competed at SRM Konvolve hackathon with problem statement of developing solutions for huamnitarian application. Designed a navigational shoe for visually imapred that provided haptic feedback in the direction of destination. The shoe connected to user's phone allowing for seemless integration with user's daily routine. Won 2nd place for the innovative idea.

text.headline: RoboGames 2018
text.text: Led the team to victory at competitions like RoboGames 2018 held in San Fransisco and won gold medal in Humanoid Bipedal Obstacle race. Won another gold for xylophone playing musical robot.

text.headline: IROS IEEE Fan Challenge
text.text: Joined HappSales PVT LTD as a software developer. Worked on developing a CRM product that was able to perform CRUD operations through natural language. Resulted in improved data entry speed and simplication of the application allowing for easier onboarding of customers.

text.headline: NLP Development head HappSales PVT LTD
text.text: Worked on developing NLP solutions engine for HappSales pvt ltd CRM product. Designed a system that was able to perform CRUD operations through natural language. Resulted in improved data entry speed and simplication of the application allowing for easier onboarding of customers.

text.headline: Northeastern University Masters in Information Systems
text.text: Pursued my masters of science in Information Systems at Northeastern University. Focused on learning about the latest technologies and how they can be applied to solve real world problems. Took classes like Neural Network Architecture, High Performance Machine Learning and Data science to learn about Deep Learning methods and their optmization techniques.
